title: Service
description: Provides information about the store service

name.description: The service instance name. This should be a very short, human-readable name that may be displayed in listings of Service instances.

description.description: The service instance description. This should be a human-readable description that may be showed in detailed views of Services. The description should be longer and more detailed than `name`.

type.description: The type identifier for the service. The value must start with 'urn:x-tams:service'

api_version.description: The version of the TAMS API specification this deployment implements

service_version.description: The version of software providing this service. Note: Different implementations and software houses may use different conventions for their version identification. As such, this field is intentionally permissive and intended to be informative only. Implementations should avoid using this field to determine compatibility.

event_stream_mechanisms.description: List the types of event stream that this implementation supports
